snippet: The analysis provided instant fuel for both supporters and critics of raising the federal minimum wage.
abstract: Congressional Budget Office report shows that popular Democratic proposal to raise minimum wage to $10.10 an hour could reduce total employment by 500,000 workers by end of 2016, but would also lift 900,000 families out of poverty and increase incomes of 16.5 million low-wage workers in an average week; mixed conclusion provides instant fuel for both supporters and critics of raising federal minimum wage.
lead_paragraph: The analysis provided instant fuel for both supporters and critics of raising the federal minimum wage.

headline.main: Minimum Wage Increase Would Have Mixed Effects, C.B.O. Report Says
headline.print_headline: Study Finds Mixed Effect in Changing Wage Law
